events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred yesterday evening, resulting in moderate damage to the front bumper and left headlight.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details and verifying keywords related to a car collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the case quickly and efficiently for the customer’s vehicle accident.
The insurance company has formally acknowledged the receipt of the auto accident claim and assured the customer of ongoing support.
A request was sent to the customer asking for photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimate for further processing.
The customer uploaded the required documents including vehicle photos, police report, and an official repair quote from the authorized garage.
Investigation into the claim began to determine the extent of vehicle damage and verify the circumstances of the reported accident.
The investigation has been completed confirming the accident details and damage assessment provided by the customer and third parties.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer detailing the compensation amount for repairs and lost use of the vehicle.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing appreciation for the prompt resolution and clear communication.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement, clearing the way for payment disbursement.
Payment corresponding to the agreed settlement amount was issued and transferred to the customer’s bank account today.
The insurance claim has been closed after successful payment and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs have commenced.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim were securely archived as the case is now fully resolved.
